Reviews.Title: KGUARD combo kit
Reviews.Author: wanger
Reviews.Content: Great product-kit has it all and can easily be set up by anyone. The picture on the monitor is clear and color is good.The DVR has all kinds of ways to run the cameras. I will by another if I ever need to.

ProductInfo.Features:
Display Modes Full Screen/Quad/PIP/S.E.Q.
Audio Compression 8kHz*16bit ADPCM
Record Resolution NTSC CIF(352x240)/HD1(704x240)/D1(704x480)
Infrared Distance 10M (33-Feet)
Minimum Illumination 0 LUX (IR ON)/F1.2
ProductInfo.Name: KGUARD All-In-One Surveillance Combo Kit 4 Channel H.264 DVR with 4 CMOS Cameras (OT401-4CW134M-500G)
